blogPost.excerpt: WeHatePasswords is a Google Chrome extension that replaces all password fields with easy to remember pixel art. Gone are the days of remembering complicated passwords. Simply draw to log in. Compatible with password managers.
blogPost.body: WeHatePasswords is a Google Chrome extension that replaces all password fields with easy to remember pixel art. Gone are the days of remembering complicated passwords. Simply draw to log in. Compatible with password managers.
blogPost.title: WeHatePasswords 2.0 - You hate passwords. That's where we come in.
blogPost.author: Dalton Edwards

localize.description: WeHatePasswords是一款谷歌浏览器扩展，它可以用易于记忆的像素艺术取代所有密码字段。记住复杂密码的日子已经一去不复返了。只需画出密码即可登录。与密码管理器兼容。
localize.tagline: 你讨厌密码 这就是我们的优势所在。

localize.description: WeHatePasswords是一款谷歌瀏覽器擴展，它可以用易於記憶的像素藝術取代所有密碼字段。記住複雜密碼的日子已經一去不復返了。只需畫出密碼即可登錄。與密碼管理器兼容。
localize.tagline: 你討厭密碼 這就是我們的優勢所在。

previous.excerpt: Happy Things is here to help you live a happier life! With hundreds of small, diverse daily activities, the mobile app guides and motivates you to do one thing each day to boost your happiness.
previous.title: Happy Things - Simple, daily activities to increase your happiness

localize.description: Happy Things是来帮助你过上更快乐的生活的! 这款手机应用通过上百种多样的日常小活动，引导和激励你每天做一件事，提升你的幸福感。
localize.tagline: 简单的日常活动，增加你的幸福感

localize.description: Happy Things是來幫助你過上更快樂的生活的! 這款手機應用通過上百種多樣的日常小活動，引導和激勵你每天做一件事，提升你的幸福感。
localize.tagline: 簡單的日常活動，增加你的幸福感

next.title: spotfindr 2.0 - Discover thousands of amazing drone spots around the globe

localize.description: 享受飞行无人机与spotfindr 🔎发现世界各地的惊人地点🚦获得每个地点的无人机规定☁️每个地点的实时天气数据📍获得你当前位置的无人机规定。
localize.tagline: 发现全球数千处令人惊叹的无人机景点

localize.description: 享受飛行無人機與spotfindr 🔎發現世界各地的驚人地點🚦獲得每個地點的無人機規定☁️每個地點的實時天氣數據📍獲得你當前位置的無人機規定。
localize.tagline: 發現全球數千處令人驚歎的無人機景點
